About

Our Vision

Levin’s Pharmadeals International (OPC) Pvt Ltd, established with a vision of bringing variety of products under one roof, saving efforts of buyers, searching commodities with excessively large and hectic group of sellers.

Maintain Quality and competitive price is our motive between challenges of price wars and competition.

Expanding exports of pharmaceuticals & medical items throughout the globe.

Currently we are exporting to:

  • South East Asia,
  • South pacific ISLANDS,
  • Mauritius,
  • Madagascar and
  • East Africa.

Soon, company is going to be a part of pharmaceutical export Council of India as registered member which are recognized for their credibility in export business.

Levins established with a vision of bringing variety of Products under One-Roof saving efforts of buyers.
